title: Amazon is selling its Echo device for just 99 CENTS right now
text:
Amazon has just launched one of their best deals ever, offering its Echo Dot device for the insanely low price of just $0.99.

The offer is available when you purchase one month of Amazon Music Unlimited, which means the whole deal will cost you $8.78 (if you're an Amazon Prime member) - a huge reduction on the normal retail price of $49.99 for the 3rd generation.

If you're not an Amazon Prime member, the cost of Amazon Music Unlimited is slightly higher ($9.99) making the total price ever so slightly higher at $10.98.

Amazon has just launched one of their best deals ever, offering its Echo device for the insanely low price of just $0.99

Amazon Music Unlimited benefits include unlimited access to 50 million songs, an always ad-free experience, unlimited skips, hands-free listening with Alexa, and the ability to listen on all your devices.

With this deal, the Amazon Music Unlimited auto-renew for $7.99 per month after the first month but you can cancel or change anytime.

Click HERE to access the deal on Amazon.
